extension_activated.comment: Tracks when the extension is activated

ide.comment: The IDE being used (VS Code, etc.)

server_started.comment: Tracks when the server is successfully started

port.comment: The port number the server is running on

toolbar_setup_completed.comment: Tracks when the toolbar setup is completed successfully

toolbar_setup_failed.comment: Tracks when the toolbar setup fails

agent_prompt_triggered.comment: Tracks when an agent prompt is triggered by the user

activation_error.comment: Tracks when the extension activation fails

extension_deactivated.comment: Tracks when the extension is deactivated

telemetry_disabled.comment: Tracks when a user disables telemetry collection. This helps understand opt-out rates and is tracked once when the setting changes before telemetry is actually disabled.

telemetry_enabled.comment: Tracks when a user re-enables telemetry collection after previously disabling it.
